resources.string: There are no Google accounts on this phone. In order to use Recontrol, you must have at least one Google account active on the phone in addition to the Android Market. Please configure an account then restart Recontrol.

Recontrol is an application to remotely control and track your phone. It uses Android Cloud to Device Messaging to send messages that will invoke a GPS locator, Web download, or JavaScript file on your phone. To continue, you will need to allow access to your Google account. If you have more than one account, you will be prompted to select one.

The ability to download any file and invoke JavaScript gives you the power to do absolutely anything allowed by Android on your phone through a remote service.
